## Active Technologies
- Zsh (compatible with Zsh 5.0+) + Zsh builtins, POSIX utilities, Git (for plugin management) (001-build-a-zsh)

- Cache files (zcompdump in $PULSE_CACHE_DIR), HISTFILE for shell history (002-create-the-zsh)
